title: Mafia Miss Fortune hair clipping through hat
body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/wcjN1Nuk-mafia-miss-fortunes-hair-clips-in-game

I wrote another topic on it, with an Image included!

replies.body:
Hey RobinTheLegend, 

Thanks for the report! Looks like this is a known issue. Let me check up on the status of it!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QQrI4ToZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-07T19:15:13.151+0000)
>
> Hey RobinTheLegend, 
> 
> Thanks for the report! Looks like this is a known issue. Let me check up on the status of it!

*Three Months Later* What is the status?

Hey CRYSTAL MAlDEN - 

At this time, it's not something we'll be prioritizing.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QQrI4ToZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-29T18:44:55.302+0000)
>
> Hey CRYSTAL MAlDEN - 
> 
> At this time, it's not something we'll be prioritizing.

Okay? I'll check back in another 3 months...
